weight.title: Weight is an percentage of traffic being sent to this destination

serviceName.title: ServiceName is the Kubernetes service name traffic is being sent to

podTemplateHash.title: PodTemplateHash is the pod template hash label for this destination

weight.title: Weight is an percentage of traffic being sent to this destination

serviceName.title: ServiceName is the Kubernetes service name traffic is being sent to

podTemplateHash.title: PodTemplateHash is the pod template hash label for this destination

weight.title: Weight is an percentage of traffic being sent to this destination

serviceName.title: ServiceName is the Kubernetes service name traffic is being sent to

podTemplateHash.title: PodTemplateHash is the pod template hash label for this destination

additional.title: Additional holds the weights split to additional ReplicaSets such as experiment ReplicaSets

verified.title:
Verified is an optional indicator that the weight has been verified to have taken effect.
This is currently only applicable to ALB traffic router

weights.title: TrafficWeights describes the current status of how traffic has been split

stablePingPong.title: StablePingPong For the ping-pong feature holds the current stable service, ping or pong

index.title: Index is the matching step index of the executed plugin

name.title: Name is the matching step name of the executed plugin

operation.title: Operation is the name of the operation that produced this status

phase.title: Phase is the resulting phase of the operation

message.title: Message provides details on why the plugin is in its current phase

seconds.description:
Represents seconds of UTC time since Unix epoch
1970-01-01T00:00:00Z. Must be from 0001-01-01T00:00:00Z to
9999-12-31T23:59:59Z inclusive.

nanos.description:
Non-negative fractions of a second at nanosecond resolution. Negative
second values with fractions must still have non-negative nanos values
that count forward in time. Must be from 0 to 999,999,999
inclusive. This field may be limited in precision depending on context.

startedAt.description:
Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct
marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many
of the factory methods that the time package offers.

+protobuf.options.marshal=false
+protobuf.as=Timestamp
+protobuf.options.(gogoproto.goproto_stringer)=false

backoff.title: Backoff is a duration to wait before trying to execute the operation again if it was not completed

executions.title: Executions is the number of time the operation was executed

disabled.title: Disabled indicates if the plugin is globally disabled

status.title:
+kubebuilder:validation:Schemaless
+kubebuilder:pruning:PreserveUnknownFields
+kubebuilder:validation:Type=object
Status holds the internal status of the plugin for this operation

stepPluginStatuses.title: StepPluginStatuses holds the status of the step plugins executed

title: CanaryStatus status fields that only pertain to the canary rollout
